name: Samsung Galaxy S6 (USA)
description: Samsung Galaxy S6 (USA) Android smartphone. Announced 2015, March. Features 3G, 5.1″ Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Network.Speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps, EV-DO Rev.A 3.1 Mbps

Platform.OS: Android OS, v5.0.2 (Lollipop), upgradable to v5.1 (Lollipop)
Platform.CPU: Quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57

Camera.Primary: 16 MP, f/1.9, 28mm, OIS, autofocus, LED flash
Camera.Features: 1/2.6" sensor size, 1.12 �m pixel size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, Auto HDR, panorama
Camera.Secondary: 5 MP, f/1.9, 22mm, 1440p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, heart rate, SpO2
Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
Others: S-Voice natural language commands and dictation
Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic

Misc.Colors: White Pearl, Black Sapphire, Gold Platinum
